title: 10.Subhas Chandra Bose: The Forgotten Hero
description: The story of Subhas Chandra Bose, a fierce nationalist and the leader of the Indian National Army.

content.text: Subhas Chandra Bose was a prominent leader in the Indian independence movement, known for his radical approach to gaining freedom from British rule.

question.question: 1.What was Subhas Chandra Bose’s approach to independence?

content.text: Bose formed the Indian National Army (INA) to fight against the British during World War II, receiving support from countries like Japan and Germany.

question.question: 2.What was the purpose of the Indian National Army?
options: B. To aid the British Army

content.text: Subhas Chandra Bose’s leadership inspired millions, but he remains a controversial figure in India's history due to his collaboration with Axis powers.

question.question: 3.How is Subhas Chandra Bose viewed in history?

content.text: Bose’s famous slogan, ‘Give me blood and I will give you freedom,’ continues to resonate as a symbol of resistance against colonialism.

question.question: 4.What slogan is Subhas Chandra Bose famous for?
options: A. Give me blood and I will give you freedom
question.answer: A. Give me blood and I will give you freedom

content.text: Though Bose did not live to see India’s independence, his contributions to the freedom struggle are remembered with respect.
